Line 6: Start at (0.0, 0.0632) and end at (0.0, 0.0). These nine curves form a single loop, which is closed. 4. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. 5. The dimensions of this part are 0.0237 m in length, 0.75 m in width, and 0.75 m in height.</description>
